The Pharma Reference Ontology model is a compilation of the main terms and objects related to 
pharmaceutical products; it provides general characteristics of them and classifies the terms 
according to the ATC classification, which is the WHO recommendation that the pharmaceutical 
experts in Spain (Europe) follow.

Figure 42 shows the activities involved in the development of the Nomenclature ontology network. 
It presents the main scenarios (of those presented in chapter 4) covered in this NeOn use case.
